name: Starr Mirror (Jam Ed)
description:
Starr Mirror is a little arcade game in which you must collect stars with your reflection within 2 minutes!

Each star is worth 10 points.

Controls:

  • left/right arrows to move
  • space/enter to jump

UP: A small bug seem to appear randomly, in which the reflection is not at the same x-position as the player. To solve it go to the border until they realign. I'm looking into solving it.
